data.title: Teaching and Learning Services

Co-Op Student Highlight: Virtual Reality Development at the Experiential Learning Hub

Bella MacCulloch, a third-year co-op student in the Interactive Media and Design (IMD) program is helping the Experiential Learning Hub (ELH) make... More

Bella MacCulloch, a third-year co-op student in the Interactive Media and Design (IMD) program is helping the Experiential Learning Hub (ELH) make strides in exploring the development of virtual reality experiences for teaching and learning purposes. As part of her co-op placement at the ELH, Bella is crafting a Biochemistry virtual reality experience... More

Announcing the 2024 Carleton University Teaching Award Recipients

Vice-Provost and Associate Vice-President (Academic) David Hornsby, is pleased to announce the outstanding educators receiving the 2024 Carleton University Teaching Award. Aaron Doyle (Department of Sociology and Anthropology) and Katie Lucas (Institute of Environmental and Interdisciplinary Science) have received the Provostâ€™s Fellowship in Teaching... More

Brian Greenspan Named 2024 Carleton University Chair in Teaching Innovation

Brian Greenspan, an Associate Professor in the Department of English Language and Literature and the College of the Humanities, has been named the 2024 Carleton University Chair in Teaching... More

Brian Greenspan, an Associate Professor in the Department of English Language and Literature and the College of the Humanities, has been named the 2024 Carleton University Chair in Teaching Innovation for his commitment to student success and novel approach to digital storytelling. The Chair in Teaching Innovation recognizes educators who have demonstrated... More
